Articles.Content:
As I was putting my Eve Parachute System through a test on Kerbin (Which went quite well, to be honest), I landed the probe at KSC without it's backup engine. So, I decided to do a bit of crash resistance on the craft. I set it to Warp x4, and it landed on the ground, and the camera went through Kerbin, a similar event happening in Messing Around in Kerbal Space Program 7.

Now, where's the trophy?
I think Danny took all the trophies in the "How to break KSP horribly" category already
Good luck on taming the Kraken! You must feed it Kerbals and rockets.
